.method public static hidebysig class UIKit.IUIFocusEnvironment[] GetPreferredFocusEnvironments(class UIKit.IUIFocusEnvironment This) cil managed

Docs.param: The focus environment on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Gets the list of focus environments, ordered by priority, that the environment prefers when updating the focus.
